Tanks

Class Parachutes

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.Parachutes

  • public class Parachutes
extends java.lang.Object
    The Parachutes class represents a parachute system for a tank, managing the deployment and usage of parachutes, and calculating descent rates and damage.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DAMAGE_PER_PIXEL 
      static int FAST_DESCENT_RATE 
      static int SLOW_DESCENT_RATE 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Parachutes(int initialCount)
      Constructs a Parachutes object with an initial number of parachutes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buyOneParachute()
      Adds one parachute to the count.
      void checkAndDeploy()
      Checks and deploys a parachute if available.
      int getCount()
      Returns the current count of available parachutes.
      int[] getDescentInfo()
      Returns the descent rate and damage information based on parachute availability.
      boolean hasParachutes()
      Checks if there are any parachutes available.
      boolean isDeployed()
      Checks if a parachute is currently deployed.
      void resetDeployment()
      Resets the deployment status of the parachute.
      void useParachute()
      Uses a parachute if available and marks it as deployed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Parachutes

        public Parachutes(int initialCount)
        Constructs a Parachutes object with an initial number of parachutes.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • getDescentInfo

        public int[] getDescentInfo()
        Returns the descent rate and damage information based on parachute availability.
        Returns:
        an array where the first element is the descent rate (pixels per second) and the second element is the damage per pixel.

      • hasParachutes

        public boolean hasParachutes()
        Checks if there are any parachutes available.
        Returns:
        true if there are parachutes available, false otherwise.

      • resetDeployment

        public void resetDeployment()
        Resets the deployment status of the parachute.

      • checkAndDeploy

        public void checkAndDeploy()
        Checks and deploys a parachute if available.

      • useParachute

        public void useParachute()
        Uses a parachute if available and marks it as deployed.

      • isDeployed

        public boolean isDeployed()
        Checks if a parachute is currently deployed.
        Returns:
        true if a parachute is deployed, false otherwise.

      • buyOneParachute

        public void buyOneParachute()
        Adds one parachute to the count.

      • getCount

        public int getCount()
        Returns the current count of available parachutes.
        Returns:
        the number of available parachutes.
